articles.description: Recent fossil findings in Wales have uncovered the tropical habitats of early dinosaurs and provided insights into a complex prehistoric ecosystem, marking a significant advancement in understanding the region's paleontological history. A significant fossil d…
articles.content: A major fossil discovery in Wales reveals early dinosaurs lived on a tropical lowland by the sea over 200 million years ago. The study identified rare marine and terrestrial fossils, reconstructing a… [+4168 chars]
